A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A very weak\, inconsistent story line. Mired with political agenda\, and terrible plot holes.
This is a terrible way to bring the Skywalker saga to it's penultimate close\, and no doubt has alienated a large portion of the audience who just wanted to watch another Sci-Fi romp across the galaxy\, and instead were force fed a bowl of poltical bantha fodder!

Veiwer avoidance advised!
